APP.TITLE: Archery League
APP.ABOUT: On the page of Bogenliga DE, here you will find all the information of the German leagues in archery. Browse through the leagues and let yourself be drawn into the fascination of team archery.

HOME.TITLE: Archery League GER
HOME.CONTENT: On the page of Bogenliga DE, here you will find all the information of the German leagues in archery. Browse through the leagues and let yourself be drawn into the fascination of team archery.

REGIONEN.TITLE: Regions
REGIONEN.DESCRIPTION: To select a league, click on the corresponding region. For example for the Wuerttemberg-league on the Wuerttembergischer Schuetzenverband
REGIONEN.CLOSE: To navigate back, click on the inner circle.

DOWNLOADFEHLER.TITLE: Error creating Individual statistic:
DOWNLOADFEHLER.DESCRIPTION: Could not generate Individual statistic. Could not find Archers for selection.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Offline-Mode enabled
SUCCESS.DESCRIPTION: The data was successfully stored offline and the offline mode was activated.

FAILURE.TITLE: Failure while loading the data
FAILURE.DESCRIPTION: The data wasn't successfully loaded for the offline mode!

SUCCESS.TITLE: The data was successfully saved
SUCCESS.DESCRIPTION: The data was successfully saved online and the online mode was reactivated.

FAILURE.TITLE: Error when resynchronizing the data
FAILURE.DESCRIPTION: The data could not be fully synchronized for the online mode!

TABLET_INPUT.SCHUETZEN_NUMMERN: Please enter the archer-numbers for this match:

DOWNLOADFEHLER.TITLE: Failure while creating the seeding list:
DOWNLOADFEHLER.DESCRIPTION: Seeding list was not created successful because there is no data about the former competition day..

DOWNLOADFEHLER.TITLE: Failure while creating the arch control list:
DOWNLOADFEHLER.DESCRIPTION: Arch control list was not created successful because there is no seeding list existing.

DOWNLOADFEHLER.TITLE: Failure while creating the registration form:
DOWNLOADFEHLER.DESCRIPTION: Registration form was not created successfully because there are no existing archers.

UNEXPECTED_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: An unexpected error occurred on the server.

NO_PERMISSION_ERROR.TITLE: No Permission Error
NO_PERMISSION_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: You don't have permission to enter or edit this page.

CONNECTION_ERROR.TITLE: Session Token expired
CONNECTION_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: It seems that your session has expired! Please login again.

CONNECTION_RESET.TITLE: Connection Reset
CONNECTION_RESET.DESCRIPTION: Could not reach service. Try again later.

NO_SESSION_ERROR.TITLE: No Session Error
NO_SESSION_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: Your session has expired. You will be redirected to the login page.

BAD_REQUEST.TITLE: Bad Request
BAD_REQUEST.DESCRIPTION: Your request was rejected by the server.

INVALID_ARGUMENT_ERROR.TITLE: Invalid Argument Error
INVALID_ARGUMENT_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: Your request was rejected by the server.

INVALID_SIGN_IN_CREDENTIALS.TITLE: Invalid Sign In Credentials
INVALID_SIGN_IN_CREDENTIALS.DESCRIPTION: Please check your email address and password

TOO_MANY_INCORRECT_LOGIN_ATTEMPTS.TITLE: login attempt blocked
TOO_MANY_INCORRECT_LOGIN_ATTEMPTS.DESCRIPTION: The number of incorrect login attempts has been exceeded. Please try again in 5 minutes.

DATABASE_ERROR.TITLE: Database Error
DATABASE_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: Your request was rejected by the database.

ENTITY_NOT_FOUND_ERROR.TITLE: Entity Not Found Error
ENTITY_NOT_FOUND_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: The requested resource was not found.
